pageContent: Purpose: In this study, the efficacy of transurethral prostate ablation in the presence of silica-shell ultrasound-triggered phase-shift emulsions (sUPEs) doped with MR contrast was evaluated. The influence of sUPEs on MR imaging assessment of the ablation zone was also investigated.

metaData.source:
[Treatment by focalized high intensity ultrasound and nursing care]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/17419571/
